headline: NTR's $200M Cost-Saving Drive: Can Expense Cuts Unlock Margin Upside?
summary: Nutrien targets $200M in 2025 cost savings, with Retail and SG&A cuts set to lift margins and free cash flow.

raw.headline: NTR's $200M Cost-Saving Drive: Can Expense Cuts Unlock Margin Upside?
raw.summary: Nutrien targets $200M in 2025 cost savings, with Retail and SG&A cuts set to lift margins and free cash flow.

headline: BASFY to Exit Hydrosulfites Business and Shut Production Facility
summary: BASF SE will exit its hydrosulfites business, closing the Ludwigshafen facility as part of a broader portfolio streamlining.

raw.headline: BASFY to Exit Hydrosulfites Business and Shut Production Facility
